A Step-by-Step Guide

Getting Started

This step-by-step guide helps you to customize Feeling Responsive to your needs.

  1. Open _config.yml and work it through, it’s well documented
  2. Add your own logo.png to /images/.
  3. Open _data/socialmedia.yml and add your own social media links.
  4. Open _data/navigation.yml and customize your navigation.
  5. Open _data/language.yml and translate the theme if necessary.
  6. Open _data/services.yml and customize links in the footer.
  7. Open _data/network.yml and customize links in the footer.
  8. Open _data/authors.yml and edit author information and set default author in config.yml.
  9. Read the documentation to check out all features of Feeling Responsive.
  10. Make it yours and add your own content.

Check out the documentation for all the tricks ›

Dialogue & Discussion

About This Site

»Alchemist« is a toolchain that includes a simulation engine, an extensible model, and a set of utilities targeted at simulating pervasive systems. Due to its chemical inspiration, Alchemist is suitable for (bio) chemical stochastic simulations. More ›
